XenotypeDef.label: abednedo
XenotypeDef.description: Abednedos are a sentient species native to the planet Abednedo in the Colonies region of the Galaxy. Abednedo are humanoid and mammalian, and their face featured dangling mouth tendrils and two fleshy nostrils. They are a common sight in the galaxy, and were found in multiple, contrasting professions.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Abednedos are a sentient species native to the planet Abednedo in the Colonies region of the Galaxy.

GeneDef.label: abednedo head
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have the Abednedo racial head type.
